document.docAuthor: Khedher, Hassib Ben, Yildirim, Erol, Braham, Mohamed & Ljubomirov, Toshko
document.docTitle: Podalonia tydei subsp. tydei tydei (Le Guillou 1841
document.masterDocTitle: First checklist of Tunisian sphecid wasps (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) with new and additional records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First checklist of Tunisian sphecid wasps (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) with new and additional records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ammophila tydei Le Guillou, 1841
. Revue Zoologique par la Société Cuvierienne, 1841: 324.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ammophila ( Psammophila ) Tydei
:
Schulz, 1905: 55
( Sfax , Sousse );
Kohl, 1906: 284
( Tunisia : no specific locality);
von Schulthess, 1926: 208
( Kairouan , Sfax , Tozeur ).

Podalonia tydei : Dollfuss, 2010a: 556
( Gafsa, Kasserine, Kebili, Le Kef, Tataouine, Tozeur ).
